name: webhook-example-monorepo
description: Monorepo untuk sistem integrasi PMS dan CRM dengan webhook

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:crm && npm run install:pms
scripts.dev:sequential: npm run dev:crm & npm run dev:pms
scripts.build: npm run build:crm && npm run build:pms
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:crm && npm run db:migrate:pms
scripts.db:revert: npm run db:revert:crm && npm run db:revert:pms
scripts.db:sync: npm run db:sync:crm && npm run db:sync:pms
scripts.db:truncate: npm run db:truncate:crm && npm run db:truncate:pms
scripts.clean: npm run clean:crm && npm run clean:pms
scripts.clean:crm: cd crm-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:pms: cd pms-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.test: npm run test:crm && npm run test:pms
scripts.lint: npm run lint:crm && npm run lint:pms

author: Your Organization
